subject: p13473495
History: Evaluation of the patient with gram-negative rod bacteria.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The ET tube tip is 39 cm above the carina. The NG tube tip passes below the diaphragm terminating in the stomach.
